name: HorizontalAlignment
shortdesc: The horizontal alignment of an anchored object. Not valid when anchored position is inline.

property.name: RIGHT_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object to the right of the reference.

property.name: LEFT_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object to the left of the reference.

property.name: CENTER_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object at the center of the reference.

property.name: TEXT_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object relative to the text alignment.
